typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> ReadDeleteActionFamilies
ReadDeleteActionFamilies select(mapColumn(
		{$id} = Name),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> IdSelection
IdSelection derive({$metadata.$model} = 'dtmi:ActionFamily;1',
	{$entityDelete} = 'true') ~> ModelDefinition
ModelDefinition sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['tmp_ActionFamilies.v1.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteToTempRepo
source(output(
		Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> ReadTempStatusActionFamiliesStatusEditor
ReadDeleteActionFamilies select(mapColumn(
		Name),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> StatusColumnSelectionActionFamiliesStatusEditor
ReadTempStatusActionFamiliesStatusEditor, StatusColumnSelectionActionFamiliesStatusEditor exists(ReadTempStatusActionFamiliesStatusEditor@Name == StatusColumnSelectionActionFamiliesStatusEditor@Name,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> StatusUpdateActionFamiliesStatusEditor
StatusUpdateActionFamiliesStatusEditor sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['ActionFamilies_status.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteTempStatusStatusUpdateActionFamiliesStatusEditor
source(output(
		SustainmentAction as string,
		ActionFamily as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> ReadTempStatusSustainmentActionsActionFamiliesStatusEditor
ReadDeleteActionFamilies select(mapColumn(
		Name),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> StatusColumnSelectionSustainmentActionsActionFamiliesStatusEditor
ReadTempStatusSustainmentActionsActionFamiliesStatusEditor, StatusColumnSelectionSustainmentActionsActionFamiliesStatusEditor exists(Name == ActionFamily,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> StatusUpdateSustainmentActionsActionFamiliesStatusEditor
StatusUpdateSustainmentActionsActionFamiliesStatusEditor sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['SustainmentActionsActionFamilies_status.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteTempStatusStatusUpdateSustainmentActionsActionFamiliesStatusEditor
source(output(
		TechnicalPolicy as string,
		ActionFamily as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> ReadTempStatusTechnicalPoliciesMainActionFamiliesStatusEditor
ReadDeleteActionFamilies select(mapColumn(
		Name),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> StatusColumnSelectionTechnicalPoliciesMainActionFamiliesStatusEditor
ReadTempStatusTechnicalPoliciesMainActionFamiliesStatusEditor, StatusColumnSelectionTechnicalPoliciesMainActionFamiliesStatusEditor exists(Name == ActionFamily,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> StatusUpdateTechnicalPoliciesMainActionFamiliesStatusEditor
StatusUpdateTechnicalPoliciesMainActionFamiliesStatusEditor sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['TechnicalPoliciesMainActionFamilies_status.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteTempStatusStatusUpdateTechnicalPoliciesMainActionFamiliesStatusEditor
source(output(
		TechnicalPolicy as string,
		ActionFamily as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> ReadTempStatusTechnicalPoliciesSecondaryActionFamiliesStatusEditor
ReadDeleteActionFamilies select(mapColumn(
		Name),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> StatusColumnSelectionTechnicalPoliciesSecondaryActionFamiliesStatusEditor
ReadTempStatusTechnicalPoliciesSecondaryActionFamiliesStatusEditor, StatusColumnSelectionTechnicalPoliciesSecondaryActionFamiliesStatusEditor exists(Name == ActionFamily,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> StatusUpdateTechnicalPoliciesSecondaryActionFamiliesStatusEditor
StatusUpdateTechnicalPoliciesSecondaryActionFamiliesStatusEditor sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['TechnicalPoliciesSecondaryActionFamilies_status.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteTempStatusStatusUpdateTechnicalPoliciesSecondaryActionFamiliesStatusEditor
source(output(
		ActionFamily as string,
		SubActionFamily as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> ReadTempStatusActionFamiliesSubActionFamiliesStatusEditor
ReadDeleteActionFamilies select(mapColumn(
		Name),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> StatusColumnSelectionActionFamiliesSubActionFamiliesStatusEditor
ReadTempStatusActionFamiliesSubActionFamiliesStatusEditor, StatusColumnSelectionActionFamiliesSubActionFamiliesStatusEditor exists(Name == ActionFamily,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> StatusUpdateActionFamiliesSubActionFamiliesStatusEditor
StatusUpdateActionFamiliesSubActionFamiliesStatusEditor sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['ActionFamiliesSubActionFamilies_status.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteTempStatusStatusUpdateActionFamiliesSubActionFamiliesStatusEditor
source(output(
		ActionFamily as string,
		ActionTask as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> ReadTempStatusActionFamiliesActionTasksStatusEditor
ReadDeleteActionFamilies select(mapColumn(
		Name),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> StatusColumnSelectionActionFamiliesActionTasksStatusEditor
ReadTempStatusActionFamiliesActionTasksStatusEditor, StatusColumnSelectionActionFamiliesActionTasksStatusEditor exists(Name == ActionFamily,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> StatusUpdateActionFamiliesActionTasksStatusEditor
StatusUpdateActionFamiliesActionTasksStatusEditor sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['ActionFamiliesActionTasks_status.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteTempStatusStatusUpdateActionFamiliesActionTasksStatusEditor
